name: Lone Ranger

ingredients.item: Rich simple syrup (two parts sugar, one part water)

preparation:
Mix up this tequila-and-sparkling-wine sipper and relax on a sunny spring day.

Add the tequila, lemon juice and simple syrup to a shaker.

Fill with ice and shake.

Open the shaker and add the sparkling wine, then strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with a lemon twist.
